name: Strength of Mount Mugamba
tooltip:
Strength of Mount MugambaLevel 60

Master <name>, you return! Molthor has sent word of your deeds to the King. Your name is known even in the South Seas. Perhaps one day you will be a legendary <class> - a story for the ages.

Give me your talisman so that I may once more amplify its power.

Requirements:
- Strength of Mugamba
